title: Softzone
web-dev-content: Full-stack customized web development to build innovate and ready-to-launch web solutions for your business.
mobile-dev-content: Build well-designed and optimized custom mobile applications with a delightful UX for both iOS and Android.
design-content: Give us an idea, and our designers bring it to life. We offer you state-of-the-art design according to your business needs, and also to increase the conversion rate and dwell time.
staff-aug-content: Scale up your team with the best talent pool of developers in Vietnam. Solving the problem of resource in your project is too easy with Softzone.
business-content: We provide services on: e-commerce, payment, ewallet, collborator, chat, Idap, ... and more.
services-subtitle: We build websites and mobile applications with the latest technology
steps-subtitle: Joining with Softzone, we ensure your sustainable and long-term benefits because of our ability of rapid innovation and execution.
milestone-subtitle: After years of hard work and dedication, we are proud of enormous milestones built by our talented people
employees-detail: Including top-notch engineers, sales, business analysts, etc.
clients-detail: More than 50 clients from different countries all around the world
reviews-subtitle: Our mission is building happiness for customers

reviews-1.subtitle: Frontend Developer at HGK
reviews-1.content: Softzone is great. They help me build my project and give me some advice for frontend architecture web app. Really cool.

reviews-2.subtitle: Partner - Owner of Cooky App
reviews-2.content: Sotfzone can fulfill the requirements for my app. You guys are amazing and I'm so excited for the app you've created.

reviews-3.subtitle: Co Founder Mimi App
reviews-3.content: The company has all the things I'm looking for, the direction, people, environment are all good.

reviews-4.subtitle: Fullstack Developer at Softzone
reviews-4.content: The company has all the things I'm looking for, the direction, people, environment are all good.

reviews-5.subtitle: Fullstack Developer at Softzone
reviews-5.content: Softzone is great place for your career. Most of the staff are young people.

language-content: We support a variety of languages for your project. Choose your desired language and we will use it to bring your project idea to life.
config-content: We use the latest technologies to optimize the configuration for your project. We make sure your project is well implemented and operated.
